Common.EmptyDescription: No authorized assets are available for the current type

EditModal.Description: Next connections will use these settings by default, right-click to edit

Login.Title: Input Login Site
Login.Description: Please enter the site address (e.g. https://example.com) or IP
Login.LoginSuccessDescription: Your operation has been completed successfully
Login.LoginFailedDescription: Login failed, the current account has expired, please log in again
Login.InvalidUrlError: Please enter a valid site address or IP address
Login.LoginAuthenticationExpired: Login authentication has expired. Please log in again
Login.LoginAuthenticationExpiredDescription: If there are multiple sites, you will be automatically switched to the next site
Login.AlreadyLoggedInError: You have already logged in to this site
Login.LoginFailedErrorPage: Login failed. The current page is not a login page. Please re-enter
Login.LoginFailedTimeout: Login failed. Login timeout. Please log in again
Login.InvalidCertificateMac: Login failed: certificate invalid or blocked by system security (macOS WebView). Install a valid certificate or open in system browser.
Login.InvalidCertificateGeneric: Login failed: certificate or secure connection issue.
Login.NetworkError: Login failed: network error. Please check connectivity.
Login.VersionIncompatible: The client version is incompatible with JumpServer versions earlier than v4.10.12-lts. Please download and use the v3.0.7 client.
Login.VersionNoMatch: The client version does not match the JumpServer version. Please download and use the v{version} client.

Asset.GetAssetFailed: Get asset failed, please refresh and try again

ConnectError.AclFailed: The current asset is restricted by ACL policies and cannot be accessed via the client. Please use the Web console to connect.

Update.Installing: Installing update, the app may restart
Update.CompletedDesc: Installation finished. The app will restart automatically or please restart manually
Update.FailedDesc: Error downloading or installing the update. Please try again later
